title: Phase 2: Add About / Firm Overview + Approach section to homepage

requirements.text: Implement Phase 2 on the homepage by adding a new About / Firm Overview + Approach section immediately after the existing Trust / Intro section, using the exact Phase 2 content the user provided in their first prompt (no placeholder copy).

quotes: I provided the content for this phase in my first prompt look at it.

acceptanceCriteria: A new section is rendered on the homepage directly below the TrustIntroSection.
All visible text in the new section matches the Phase 2 content from the userâ€™s original prompt exactly (no lorem ipsum or invented copy).
No changes are made to the existing HeroSection or TrustIntroSection content.

requirements.text: Create a dedicated React component for Phase 2 (About / Firm Overview + Approach) and wire it into the existing homepage composition (frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx).
acceptanceCriteria: A new component file exists under frontend/src/components/home/ for the Phase 2 section.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx imports and renders the new Phase 2 component after <TrustIntroSection />.
The build compiles with no TypeScript errors.

requirements.text: Match the Phase 1 premium, spacious aesthetic for the Phase 2 section (mobile-first spacing, navy + muted gold accents, clean typography) and maintain semantic/SEO heading hierarchy (no additional H1; use H2/H3 as appropriate for About/Approach).
acceptanceCriteria: The Phase 2 section uses the existing design system (Raleway headings, Inter body; consistent spacing; restrained accent usage) and looks coherent with Phase 1.
The Phase 2 section does not introduce any new H1; headings start at H2 and nest correctly (H3, etc.).
Layout is responsive: content remains readable and well-spaced on mobile, tablet, and desktop.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only vendor components).
Do not modify immutable hook/provider files (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Backend changes are not required for Phase 2 (keep backend/main.mo as-is unless strictly necessary).
Use English for all user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not implement Phase 3+ homepage sections (Services/How-it-Works, Testimonials/Partners, FAQ, Footer) in this change.
Do not add new authentication flows, forms, or backend storage as part of Phase 2.
Do not introduce third-party integrations (chat, email services, maps, analytics beyond existing metadata).
